hero.subtitle1: We provide domestic & international fulfillment and IT solutions on a single platform.
hero.subtitle2: ANH, AN, and AH take full end-to-end responsibility for your inventory, fulfillment, delivery, and customer service.

about.title: Who is ANH?
about.mainTitle: Designing logistics operations and IT systems simultaneously,
about.desc1: ANH is a hybrid logistics group that designs both logistics operations and IT systems simultaneously.
about.desc2: Through our subsidiaries AN (domestic) and AH (international), we connect inventory management, fulfillment, international shipping, and CS in one seamless flow.

features.feature2: End-to-End solutions for SMEs and cross-border businesses
features.feature3: On-site operations + IT system integrated management

value1.title: One-Stop Solution
value1.desc: All processes from receiving to delivery and CS in one place

value2.title: System Integration
value2.desc: Real-time data integration via WMS, API, and dashboards

value3.title: Global Network
value3.desc: Worldwide delivery coverage through domestic hubs and international partners

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: ANH Group provides integrated logistics solutions from domestic & international logistics to IT systems and consulting

service1.subtitle: AN
service1.title: Domestic Fulfillment & 3PL
service1.desc: Complete domestic logistics services including receiving, storage, picking, packing, and courier integration

service2.subtitle: AH
service2.title: International Shipping & Cross-border
service2.desc: B2C/B2B international shipping and customs clearance services based on China and Southeast Asia partners

service3.subtitle: ANH Tech
service3.title: WMS / IT Solutions
service3.desc: ANH WMS, API integration, operational dashboards, custom feature development

service4.subtitle: ANH Consulting
service4.title: Consulting & Projects
service4.desc: Warehouse optimization, operational improvement, and process redesign projects

companies.title: Two Pillars Driving the ANH Group
companies.subtitle: AN specializing in domestic logistics and AH focusing on international logistics support clients through perfect collaboration

an.name: Advanced Network
an.subtitle: Domestic Fulfillment & 3PL Specialist
an.desc: We provide complete logistics solutions for domestic D2C and smart stores. Fast and accurate service through Gimpo and Incheon hubs.

features.f2: Supporting domestic D2C and smart stores

ah.name: Abundant Happiness
ah.subtitle: International Logistics & Cross-border Specialist
ah.desc: Specializing in China-centered international shipping and cross-border logistics. Stable service through partnerships with JT, CK, and other overseas partners.

synergy.title: AN + AH = Perfect Global Logistics
synergy.desc:
An integrated logistics network spanning domestic and international markets
Solving all your logistics needs at once

clients.title: These Clients Chose ANH
clients.subtitle: Over 50 brands across various industries are growing with ANH

case1.title: 50% Reduction in Fulfillment Lead Time
case1.desc: Reduced average fulfillment time from 2 days to 1 day through WMS system implementation and process optimization

case2.title: 30% Reduction in Return Rate
case2.desc: Reduced mis-shipments and defects through systematic inspection processes and quality management systems

case3.title: Improved International Shipping CS
case3.desc: Reduced shipping inquiry processing time by 70% through local CS support in China via AH subsidiary

cta.text: Your business can grow with ANH too
